ygData.subject: Devils and Angels?
ygData.msgSnippet: Allright, this is quite enough. This is a Beast Wars RPG, not Buffy or something, and it will stay a Beast Wars RPG. Soulstice and Benny Hillo, I d appreciate

From: Yanshosh@...

Allright, this is quite enough. This is a Beast Wars RPG, not Buffy 
or something, and it will stay a Beast Wars RPG. Soulstice and Benny 
Hillo, I'd appreciate it if you forgot about the mystical stuff and 
RPed robots, not gods.

Also, all the damage dodging and ignoring in this battle at the 
Chivtron base is getting waay too much. Start posting damage properly 
from now on please. Energon does hurt all bots, unless they are in 
beast mode, so you guys might wanna start posting for that. No bots 
are being built by God or the devil in this RPG, so lets not start 
RPing that way. Thanx.
